info.title: My User API
info.description: API for user management, authentication, etc.

BearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token in the format: Bearer <token>

post.description: Creates a new user account. The email must be unique.

email.description: The user's email address (must be unique).

400.description: Bad Request - Missing fields or email already exists.

example.message: User with this email already exists.
Something went wrong, please try again.

post.description: Logs in a user with their email and password, returning a JWT.

get.description: Retrieves the full profile for the authenticated user, including liked songs, followed artists, and playlists. Requires a valid JWT.

401.description: Unauthorized - Token is missing or invalid.

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's name, email, password, or profile picture. All fields are optional. Requires a valid JWT.

profilePicture.description: Image file to upload as the new profile picture.

401.description: Unauthorized - Token is missing or invalid.

put.description: Toggles the 'liked' status of a specific song for the authenticated user. Requires a valid JWT.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the song to like or unlike.

put.description: Toggle like status for an album. If the album is already liked, it will be removed from liked albums. If not, it will be added.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the album

put.description: Toggles the 'followed' status of a specific artist for the authenticated user. Requires a valid JWT.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the artist to follow or unfollow.

put.description: Toggles the 'followed' status of a specific playlist for the authenticated user. Requires a valid JWT.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the playlist to follow or unfollow.

post.summary: Create a new song - Admin only
post.description: Uploads a new song with audio, optional cover image, and metadata.

lyrics.example: The club isn't the best place to find a lover...

featuredArtists.description: JSON array of featured artist IDs

audio.description: Audio file (required, e.g. mp3, wav, m4a)

400.description: Bad request - Missing audio file or invalid input

get.description: Retrieve a list of songs with optional filtering by genre, artist, search, and pagination.

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: Filter songs by genre

parameters.name: artist
parameters.description: Filter songs by artist ID

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search songs by title or genre (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of songs per page

get.description: Retrieves a list of the most played songs, sorted in descending order of play count. The number of songs returned can be controlled with the optional 'limit' query parameter.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of top songs to return. Defaults to 10.

200.description: A list of top songs retrieved successfully.

get.description: Retrieves a list of the most recently added songs, sorted by their creation date in descending order. The number of songs returned can be controlled with the optional 'limit' query parameter.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of new songs to return. Defaults to 10.

200.description: A list of new release songs retrieved successfully.

get.summary: Get a specific song by its ID
get.description: Retrieves detailed information for a single song, including populated data for the main artist, album, and any featured artists.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the song to retrieve.

artist.description: The main artist of the song.

album.description: The album the song belongs to.

featuredArtists.description: A list of featured artists on the song.

artist.name: Queen
artist.bio: A British rock band formed in London in 1970.

404.description: Not Found - The song with the specified ID does not exist.

put.description: Updates an existing song by its ID. Can update metadata and/or upload new cover image and audio files. All fields are optional.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the song to update.

title.description: The new title of the song.

artistId.description: The ID of the main artist.

duration.description: The duration of the song in seconds.

isExplicit.description: Whether the song contains explicit content.

featuredArtists.description: A JSON string representing an array of artist IDs. Example: '["artistId1", "artistId2"]'

cover.description: New cover image file for the song.

audio.description: New audio file for the song.

404.description: Not Found - The song with the specified ID does not exist.

delete.summary: Delete a song by ID (Admin only)
delete.description: Deletes a specific song by its unique ID. This action also removes the song's reference from its associated artist and album. This is a protected route and requires administrator privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the song to delete.

401.description: Unauthorized - JWT token is missing or invalid.

403.description: Forbidden - User is not an administrator.

404.description: Not Found - The song with the specified ID does not exist.

post.description: Only admins can create artists. Upload artist details along with an optional image.

bio.example: American singer-songwriter. Known for narrative songwriting.

400.description: Bad request - missing fields or artist already exists

403.description: Forbidden - user is not an admin

get.description: Fetch a paginated list of artists. Supports filtering by genre and searching by name or bio.

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: Filter artists by genre

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search artists by name or bio (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of artists per page

get.description: Fetch a single artist using their unique artist ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the artist

put.description: Update artist information. Only admins can update artist details. Supports optional image upload.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the artist

403.description: Forbidden - user is not an admin

delete.description: Delete an artist by ID. This will also delete all songs and albums associated with the artist. Only admins can perform this action.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the artist

403.description: Forbidden - user is not an admin

get.description: Fetch top artists sorted by number of followers in descending order.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of top artists to return

get.summary: Get top songs of an artist
get.description: Fetch top songs of a specific artist sorted by number of plays in descending order.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the artist

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of top songs to return

404.description: No songs found for this artist
